radiographic_examinations.findings: The uterus is normal measuring 3.7 x 2.5 x 8.0 cm, homogeneous endometrium 2 mm. The right ovary has a dominant follicle measuring 2.9 x 1.9 x 2.7 cm, left ovary measures 2.1 x 1.3 x 1.8 cm, both show normal flow patterns. A complex fluid collection in the left hemipelvis corresponds to the known abscess as demonstrated on recent CT scan.
